greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binomial transform of A073145: a(n)=Sum(binomial(n,k)*A073145(k),(k=0,..,n)).
comment: a(n) is nonnegative since the real root of x^3-2*x^2+2*x-2 is dominant. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 28 2007
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-2,2).
program: (PARI) {a(n)= if(n<0, 0, polsym( x^3 -2*x^2 +2*x -2, n) [n+1])} /* _Michael Somos_, Feb 28 2007 */
results.author: Mario Catalani (mario.catalani(AT)unito.it), Sep 02 2002
